data.name: Matt Gaunt
data.bio: I'm one of the Developer Advocates on the Chrome team working from the London Office. I've had a history of developing mobile applications for agencies and looking to help developers create high quality, beautiful and fun apps for the mobile web.

talks.title: A More Awesome Web: Features You've Always Wanted
The Modern Workflow for Developing the Mobile Web
A More Awesome Web: Features You've Always Wanted
